description: Information about a specific session (conversation) with an agent.  Only the acess level can be changed on an existing session.  You will need to start a new session if you wish to use a different agentId.

agentAccessLevel.description: Required. Specifies the access level that the agent will have during this session only.

agentId.description: Optional. Most users will not use this parameter.  If you are authorized to test experimental agents, provide the ID of the agent you wish to test.
